name: A Blooming Errand
description: "My flowers are like children. They need love...coddling. Like all good things, they take time and attention."â€”Ju

bits.text: Find an alpine lily in Snowden Drifts.
Find a yellow gentian flower in the Fields of Ruin.
Find a pungent gladiolus in the Wayfarer Foothills.
Assist Researcher Yon in Seitung Province to receive crimson sunflowers.
